p: In our previous studies, we showed a high antioxidant activity of a mother tincture of Thuja occidentalis by 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl radical (DPPH) containing (3.9 mg GAE/g d.w.) polyphenols, as well as its in vitro antioxidant capacity on Caco-2 cells exposed to oxidative stress induced by H 2O 2, by MDA- and GSH-level assessments [ 37].
